text:
A classic problem from the 1982 Soviet Mathematical Olympiad

\begin{array}{l}\n{\left[n^{1 / 2}\right]+\left[n^{1 / 3}\right]+\dots+\left[n^{1 / n}\right]} \\\n\left.\| 0 g_{2} n\right]+\left[\log _{3} n\right]+\cdots+\left[\log _{n} n\right]\n\end{array}[imath]{\left[n^{1 / 2}\right]+\left[n^{1 / 3}\right]+\dots+\left[n^{1 / n}\right]} [/imath] [imath]\left.\| 0 g_{2} n\right]+\left[\log _{3} n\right]+\cdots+\left[\log _{n} n\right][/imath]
